docs.text: Welcome to PactIM Python SDK For full documentation visit https://pact-im.github.io/sdk-python . Introduction Welcome to the Pact API! You can use our API as a single messaging API. You can view code examples in the dark area to the right. This API was designed by way Implement only required. Feel you free to contact with support if you are sure what make sense to append additional methods.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Welcome to the Pact API! You can use our API as a single messaging API. You can view code examples in the dark area to the right. This API was designed by way Implement only required. Feel you free to contact with support if you are sure what make sense to append additional methods.

docs.text: Getting started 5 easy steps for integration Signup here Get your API token in account settings Connect WhatsApp or Instagram or anything here Setup webhooks using this doc Try to send or receive message Installation pip install -U pact_im from pact_im import PactClient TOKEN = 'SecretToken' client = PactClient(TOKEN)
docs.title: Getting started

docs.text: Signup here Get your API token in account settings Connect WhatsApp or Instagram or anything here Setup webhooks using this doc Try to send or receive message
docs.title: 5 easy steps for integration

docs.text: pip install -U pact_im from pact_im import PactClient TOKEN = 'SecretToken' client = PactClient(TOKEN)
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: Attachment WIP
docs.title: Attachment

docs.text: Channels from pact_im import PactClient TOKEN = 'SecretToken' client = PactClient(TOKEN) Get channels from pact_im import PactClient TOKEN = 'SecretToken' client = PactClient(TOKEN) response = client.channels.get_channels(company_id=1) for channel in response.channels: print(channel.external_id, channel.provider)
docs.title: Channels

docs.text: from pact_im import PactClient TOKEN = 'SecretToken' client = PactClient(TOKEN)
docs.title: Channels

docs.text: from pact_im import PactClient TOKEN = 'SecretToken' client = PactClient(TOKEN) response = client.channels.get_channels(company_id=1) for channel in response.channels: print(channel.external_id, channel.provider)
docs.title: Get channels

docs.text: Companies from pact_im import PactClient TOKEN = 'SecretToken' client = PactClient(TOKEN) Get companies companies_result = client.companies.get_companies(per=100) for company in companies_result.companies: print(company.name, company.description) Update company updated_external_id = client.companies.update_company( external_id=1, name='NewName', description='NewDescription' ) Create new company created_external_id = client.companies.create_company( name='MyCompany', description='company decription', phone='79250001122', webhook_url='https://example.com' )
docs.title: Companies

docs.text: from pact_im import PactClient TOKEN = 'SecretToken' client = PactClient(TOKEN)
docs.title: Companies

docs.text: companies_result = client.companies.get_companies(per=100) for company in companies_result.companies: print(company.name, company.description)
docs.title: Get companies

docs.text: updated_external_id = client.companies.update_company( external_id=1, name='NewName', description='NewDescription' )
docs.title: Update company

docs.text: created_external_id = client.companies.create_company( name='MyCompany', description='company decription', phone='79250001122', webhook_url='https://example.com' )
docs.title: Create new company
